page.title: Unions-Alitalia OK Deal, Turnaround Plan
page.text: ROME (Reuters) - Clearing the way for a make-or-break restructuring, unions at Italian airline Alitalia <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AZPIa.MI target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AZPIa.MI</A> on Wednesday agreed to unemployment packages for around 3,700 employees which would be largely paid for by the state.
